abstract: ABC’s broadcast of the 42nd annual Country Music Association Awards attracted an average of 15.9 million viewers from 8 to 11 p.m. on Wednesday, lifting the network to No. 1 in the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

lead_paragraph: ABC’s broadcast of the 42nd annual Country Music Association Awards attracted an average of 15.9 million viewers from 8 to 11 p.m. on Wednesday, lifting the network to No. 1 in the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Ratings: Country Music Awards Lift ABC to First Place
